Package org.perscholas.whatgoeswhere.repositories

Class CredentialRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perscholas.whatgoeswhere.repositories.CredentialRepository
  • @Repository
public class CredentialRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    A DAO Repository class for Credential model
    See Also:
    Credential

        Returns all Credential objects in the database

      • findByUsername

        public Credential findByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a Credential associated with the given username
        Parameters:
        username - a string of Credential's username
        Returns:
        a Credential that has the given username, null if not found

      • findByUsernameAndPassword

        public Credential findByUsernameAndPassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password)
                                     throws CredentialNotFoundException
        Returns a Credential associated with given username and password
        Parameters:
        username - a string of Credential's username
        password - a string of Credential's password
        Returns:
        a Credential that has both given username and password, null if not found
        Throws:
        CredentialNotFoundException - If a valid Credential is not found

      • findById

        public Credential findById​(int id)
        Returns a Credential associated with the given Credential's id
        Parameters:
        id - an integer of Credential's id
        Returns:
        a Credential that has the given id, null if not found

      • add

        public Credential add​(Credential credential)
               throws CredentialAlreadyExistsException
        Returns a newly added Credential object Create method of CRUD
        Parameters:
        credential - a Credential to be added to the database
        Returns:
        a Credential object added to the database
        Throws:
        CredentialAlreadyExistsException - If there already exists the same Credential in the database

      • delete

        public boolean delete​(Credential credential)
        Removes the given Credential and returns a boolean of the result Delete method of CRUD
        Parameters:
        credential - a Credential to be removed from the database
        Returns:
        true if the removal was successful, false otherwise

      • update

        public Credential update​(Credential credential)
                  throws CredentialNotFoundException
        Updates the given Credential and returns the updated Credential Update method of CRUD
        Parameters:
        credential - a Credential to be updated from the database
        Returns:
        an updated Credential object from the database
        Throws:
        CredentialNotFoundException - If a valid Credential is not found
